Key Match Events: LeBron James recorded a triple-double with 21 points, 13 assists, and 12 rebounds
Anthony Davis scored 31 points for the Lakers
Pre-Game Insights: The Lakers needed a win to end a two-game losing streak
The 76ers were without Joel Embiid and Tyrese Maxey due to suspension and injury
Post-Match Reflections: The Lakers improved their record to 5-4
Miscellaneous Highlights: D'Angelo Russell responded well after being benched by JJ Redick
Rookie Jared McCain arguably had his best game this season with 18 points
Others: Gerschon Yabusele came off the bench to add 11 points, three rebounds and one steal
The Lakers limited the Philadelphia 76ers to 21 points in the third quarter
